燘燘燘

燘字的基本解释

燘
měi
熟；烂熟。

燘字的汉语字典释义

[①]［měi］
［《廣韻》武罪切，上賄，明。］
熟；熟食煮烂。《广韻·上賄》：“燘，熟完。”《类篇·火部》：“燘，爛也……熟謂之燘。”清翟灏《通俗编·杂字》：“熟食以火再煮曰燘。”一说“爛”的讹字。

燘字的康熙字典解释

【巳集中】【火字部】　燘； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页683第19
【廣韻】武罪切【集韻】毋罪切，?音浼。【玉篇】燘燘，爛也。【集韻】熟謂之燘。　又【廣韻】呼罪切【集韻】虎猥切，?音賄。又【集韻】呼回切，音灰。義?同。

燘字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
燘字的起名意思

暂无。

Burnt
Basic explanation of words
Burnt
měi
Cooked; overcooked.
Burnt
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [měi]
["Guangyun" crippled martial arts, bribery, clear. ]
Cooked; cooked food is boiled. "Guangyun·Shangbai": "Like, cooked." "Classification·Fire Department": "Like, rotten also... Known as "Liao"." Qing Zhai Hao "Popular Edition · Miscellaneous Characters": "Cooked food is Boil the fire again and call it burnt." A false word of "rotten" was said.
Burnt
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Collection] [Fire Word Department] 　燘; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 683 Page 19
[Guang Yun] Martial crime cut [Ji Yun] No sin cut,? Yin Chu. [Jade articles] 燘瘘, rotten also. 【Jiyun】Familiar with Zhizhu.　[Guangyun] Calling for crimes [Jiyun] Tigers and cutting, sound bribery. [Jiyun] Call back and cut, the tone is gray. Righteous? Same.
Burnt
